title: february 12: happy chinese new year!
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the history of the Chinese New Year, which starts today! She also talks about how the lunar calendar made an impact on her latest releases, dawn and dusk. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
